video_prompt: A woman in elaborate silver and gold armor shifts her gaze, her expression changing from neutral to subtly engaging. Her loose brown hair gently sways with her movements as the blurred, opulent background subtly shifts, indicating a camera pan or body movement within the grand interior. The metallic armor gleams as light catches its ornate details, enhancing its intricate artistry.
image_prompt: Eye-level medium shot of an elegant woman in ornate silver and gold suit of armor, detailed with filigree, swirls, leaves, and flowers. Her brown wavy hair frames her face, revealing striking green eyes and soft pink lips. She wears an elaborate helmet covering her forehead and cheeks, leaving her nose, mouth, and chin exposed. Golden discs adorn the helmet over her ears, and a metallic piece with gold accents forms a partial mask. The armor features large, rounded pauldrons and overlapping plates with richly embossed golden designs against cool silver. Dark fabric is visible underneath. Soft lighting illuminates the metallic sheen and golden elements. Blurred background suggests a grand interior with warm, out-of-focus lights. Strength, elegance, and intricate artistry.
refined_video_prompt: Her gaze shifts, her expression subtly transitioning from neutral to engaging. Loose hair sways gently with her movements. The background subtly shifts and blurs, indicating a camera pan or body motion. Light dynamically plays across her metallic armor, causing it to gleam and highlight its intricate details.
